name: Let The Moon Cleave The Earth

system.description:
On Resound 4+, you can harness your Fury and summon the lunar gleamblade to cut the entire battlefield.

Spend 2 Beats to choose a line that goes across the entire battlefield. Bisect the battlefield according to that line, cleaving the crescent moon turned into a blade. Any enemy whose tile is touched by or adjacent to the line suffers True Hits equal to 1/2 their max HP. Afterwards, all tiles that the line touched becomes a chasm.
system.flavor: "The Moon shall descend. And so, submit, and be faithful. The Moon shall cleave the earth." - Book of the New Moon, Chapter 4, Verse 36, Lunar Scriptures.
